alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Miller (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 6:17AM CDT until September 24 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Miller County in southwestern Arkansas... Southwestern Lafayette County in southwestern Arkansas... Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northern Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Marion County in northeastern Texas... Southern Cass County in northeastern Texas... Northeastern Harrison County in northeastern Texas... * Until 700 AM CDT. * At 616 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Garland to near Bivins to near Linden, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Bossier City, Marshall, Atlanta, Vivian, Greenwood, Blanchard, Waskom, Jefferson, Linden, Benton, Plain Dealing, Oil City, Mooringsport, Bradley, Hosston, Rodessa, Belcher, Ida, and Gilliam. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
